Name: HOT GIRLS VR
About the game: Welcome to the world full of beautiful, hot girls, meet them all, play with them at the party and... Do what you want. Everything depends on your imagination You can choose one of locations full of girls, and admire their beautiful movement in the dance All girls love to dance, see how beautiful they can move. During experience you can control the time. Slow down the animation or stop it absolutely. Experience amazing moments in Virtual Reality using HTC Vive or Oculus Rift! Locations: - Palace room - City ​​in heaven - Room with candles - Twins stage - Palace Features: - Girls - slow down or stop animation - unique music - visiting the palace - girls model - different types of dance - Game designed for HTC VIVE or OCULUS RIFT - and many more...
